name: InnerGeniusWordoftheDay-Composer
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
We all have different ways of communicating. If you have a Composer in your life, sprinkle these words into your conversations with them and they will feel like you are talking their language.
Unlock your Inner Genius now.
Learn more innergeniusnow.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
